set.name: DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World

card.name: Asebi = Andromeda = Kushinada, Hundred Scenery Faerie

property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie/Origin

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Neo Evolution: You may put it on one of your light, water or nature creatures. (If a card is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or it attacks, draw a card. Then, you may put a Snow Faerie that costs 4 or less from your hand or mana zone. ■ Whenever one of your creatures would be destroyed, you may put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World

property.name: Race
property.value: Giant Snow Faerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Double Sympathy: Snow Faerie (This creature costs 2 less to summon for each of your Snow Faeries. It can't cost 2 or less.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever one of your other Snow Faerie creatures would battle, you may have this creature battle instead. ■ Each of your other Snow Faerie creatures get "blocker", untap at the end of your turn, and can't be chosen by your opponent.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of your opponent's turn, if 4 or more of your creatures left that turn, you may summon this creature for no cost. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, return any number of cards put into your graveyard or mana zone during this turn to your hand. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put any number of creatures from your hand that have total cost 4 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Snow Faerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Shieldify one of them and put the other into your hand. ■ Each of your Snow Faeries in your shield zone gets "shield trigger". ■ True Escape (When this creature would leave, you may add 2 of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the "shield trigger".)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARDMAN} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature from your other creatures to this creature.) ■ Once per turn, you may summon a Snow Faerie creature from your mana zone. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ If you have 5 or more Snow Faeries, each of your creatures gets +6000 power and "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost. If it's your opponent's turn, and you have had 2 or more of your shields broken this turn, this creature gets its Shield Trigger Plus ability.) {SUPER}: When you put this creature, tap all your opponent's creatures. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards. Then you may put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

property.value: DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World

property.name: Rules

property.value: ■ This creature costs 3 less to summon for each nature creature and/or nature tamaseed you put this turn. It can't cost 0 or less. {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ 'Civil Count 5': If you have a total of 5 or more nature creatures and/or nature tamaseeds, during your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature or tamaseed into the battle zone and that ability would trigger, that ability won't trigger instead. (For example, your opponent can't use an ability that starts with "When you put this creature".)

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana evolution: Choose a nature creature in your mana zone and put this creature on top of that creature. ■ When you put this creature, you may return all your Snow Faeries from your mana zone to your hand. If you do, put all Snow Faeries from your graveyard into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie/Shinobi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from them, show that creature to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
